TextEng: Aye, you'd be a good one to watch in the ring. Just enough panache to win the crowd.
Text: 그래, 넌 시련장에서 볼 만하겠어. 관객을 사로잡을 만한 폼이 딱 적당하네.

TextEng: Hmph. People are mad they sealed off the Blacklake district to keep out the plague. As long as I'm inside I don't care.
Text: 흥. 역병을 막는다고 검은호수 지구를 봉쇄해 놨다 해서들 화가 나 있지. 난 안에만 있으면 상관없어.

TextEng: Hmph! I'm surprised you are here. Weren't most of the louts like you put out when the barricades went up?
Text: 흥! 네가 여기 있는 게 놀랍네. 너 같은 얼간이들, 방벽을 세웠을 때 대부분 쫓겨났잖아?

TextEng: My word! Put some decent clothing on at least, <man/woman>!
Text: 이런! 옷이라도 제대로 좀 입어, 이 <man/woman>야!

TextEng: You can't run around town without anything on! Are you mad?
Text: 알몸으로 거리를 뛰어다닐 수는 없어! 미쳤냐?

TextEng: Err... forgot to put on your clothing to<day/night>, did you?
Text: 어... 옷 입는 걸 깜빡했나 보지?

TextEng: Ran into some trouble downstairs, did you?
Text: 아래층에서 곤란 좀 겪은 모양이지?

TextEng: Whoah, don't get your blood in my beer, <lad/lass>.
Text: 워, 내 맥주에 피 튀기지 마라, <lad/lass>.

TextEng: That must have been some fight you were in. Did you take the prize?
Text: 상당한 싸움이었나 보네. 상금은 챙겼냐?

TextEng: You're a rather slow one, aren't you?
Text: 넌 꽤나 굼뜨지, 그렇지?

TextEng: Sorry, but I've got no time to talk to mor... err, that is, I have to go.
Text: 미안한데, 어... 어, 그러니까, 바빠서 가 봐야겠다.

TextEng: I would chat, but I'd probably talk too fast for you.
Text: 수다를 떨 수도 있지만, 내 말이 너한텐 너무 빠를걸.

TextEng: Must you brandish that thing about up here? Save it for the cellars!
Text: 여기 위층에서 그걸 휘둘러야겠냐? 지하에서나 휘둘러!

TextEng: Stop waving that about, will you, <mister/missus>? Upstairs ain't the place for it.
Text: 그걸 휘둘러 대지 마시지, 형씨? 위층은 그럴 곳이 아니야.

TextEng: Looking to put another notch in that weapon, <mister/missus>?
Text: 무기에 눈금 하나 더 새겨 보려는 거야, 형씨?

TextEng: Welcome to the Den of Iniquity, holy roller...
Text: 타락의 소굴에 온 걸 환영해, 성스러운 분...

TextEng: A good <day/night> to you, my <lord/lady>. Is the temple sending contestants, now, too?
Text: 좋은 <day/night> 되시길, 모험가 나리. 사원에서도 이제 참가자를 보내나?

TextEng: Ha, folks, we've got ourselves a holy <man/woman> to<day/night>!
Text: 하, 여러분, 성스러운 양반이 한 분 모셨다!

TextEng: Hmph. Best keep your magics to yourself around here, <sir/madam>.
Text: 흠. 여기선 마법은 혼자만 쓰는 게 좋을 거요, 모험가 양반.

TextEng: Wizards and such are not very welcome in these parts.
Text: 이 동네에선 마법사 같은 부류는 그다지 환영받지 못하거든.

TextEng: You should have stayed in your tower, of wherever it is you folk come from.
Text: 네 꼴이 나올 데로 가서나 있었어야지, 탑이든 어디든 간에.

TextEng: It's always good to see a <race> face these days.
Text: 요즘은 <race> 얼굴만 봐도 반갑지.

TextEng: It's always a delight to see another <race> face around here.
Text: 여기서 <race> 얼굴을 또 보니 항상 기쁘군.

TextEng: Be wary of the humans in this town. They'll tax you extra for your <race> blood, I'm not joking.
Text: 이 동네 인간들을 조심해. <race> 족이라고 세금을 더 매긴다니까... 농담 아니야.

TextEng: Hello, miss. Might I say that you're looking mighty pretty today?
Text: 안녕, 아가씨. 오늘 정말 예쁘다고 말해도 될까?

TextEng: Always a pleasure to bump into a pretty lass like yourself.
Text: 그런 예쁜 아가씨를 마주치면 언제나 기분이 좋지.

TextEng: We sure don't have many local girls who look like you.
Text: 이 동네에 너 같은 아가씨는 정말 드물어.

TextEng: My, my. Hello there, handsome.
Text: 어머나. 안녕, 잘생긴 분.

TextEng: If there were more men about like you, this town wouldn't be so boring.
Text: 당신 같은 남자가 더 많다면 이 동네가 이렇게 지루하진 않을 텐데.

TextEng: (sigh) I suppose you already have a lady friend of your own...
Text: (한숨) 역시 애인이 있겠지...

TextEng: Hmm, I don't know if the Board Laid Bare is the place for nice folks such as yourself.
Text: 흠, 당신 같은 점잖은 사람이 올 곳이 '적나라한 게시판' 선술집인지는 모르겠네.

TextEng: Just between you and me, m'<lord/lady>, wouldn't you say the Wailing's put a dent in the merchants' coffers?
Text: 우리끼리만 하는 말인데, <lord/lady>, 울부짖는 죽음 역병 때문에 상인들 금고가 텅텅 비었지 않겠소?

TextEng: It's horrible, with the quarantine in place, they haven't been able to import my favorite ale.
Text: 격리 때문에 끔찍해. 내가 좋아하는 에일도 수입을 못 한다니까.

TextEng: It's cold for this time of year. I do pity the folks that have lost their homes to looting. I may even do something to help... but not until the plague is over, of course.
Text: 이맘때치곤 춥네. 약탈 때문에 집 잃은 사람들은 딱하기도 하고. 나도 뭔가 도울지도... 물론 역병이 끝나기 전엔 아니고.

TextEng: More plague-waifs cluttering up the place, I see. Excuse me.
Text: 여기저기 역병 고아들이 또 들끓는군. 실례.

TextEng: Stand away from me, you, before I call the tavern guards!
Text: 저리 비켜, 술집 경비 부르기 전에!

TextEng: You must be from up in the mountains... or maybe even further, right?
Text: 산골짝에서 온 거겠지... 아니면 더 먼 데서, 맞지?

TextEng: Ah, the Board Laid Bare's a good place for a savage brute like you.
Text: 아, '적나라한 게시판' 선술집은 너 같은 짐승 같은 놈한테 딱이지.

TextEng: Were you brought up by bears, perhaps? It smells like it.
Text: 혹시 곰한테 길러졌냐? 냄새가 딱 그런데.

TextEng: Well, wonderful. More <race> scum wandering about. If that isn't all we need.
Text: 하아, 좋아라. <race> 쓰레기가 또 돌아다니네. 딱 우리가 필요로 하던 꼴이지.

TextEng: I have better things to do than chat with any <race> n'er-do-well who wanders by.
Text: 지나가는 <race> 날도둑이랑 잡담할 만큼 한가하지 않거든.

TextEng: Oh, hello. You're one of those <race> folk, right?
Text: 오, 안녕. 너 <race>들 중 하나지?

TextEng: Good <day/night> to you, <Master/Mistress>! How runs the tavern?
Text: 좋은 <day/night>입니다, 주인장! 선술집은 잘 돌아갑니까?
